page.title: 08A Farm in the Valley
page.content: My name is Mark and me and my friend Darren went to interview the farmer.This is what we found out. The farm has 135 acres,with 60 cows and 182 sheep. The cows are mostly friesian and the sheep are Kerry breed.The farmer told us that he ploughed 17 acres and grew barley,with one acre of potatoes.He has 7 sheds,2 sheep dogs and three tractors. {On two fields are the caravans for {visitors.There are 47 caravans and in {Summer the farmer is kept very busy {with the tourists. He said that the visitors were mostly quite careful with closing gates and not frightening sheep.Most of them liked to see him milk and do other work on the farm.{
